mapper.insert: INSERT INTO J_참여자관리 (취창업일, 취창업처리일, 취업유형, 취업처, 임금, 직무, 취업인센티브_구분, 일경험분류, 메모, 기타, 퇴사일) VALUES ( #{employmentStartDate}, #{employmentProcDate}, #{employmentEmpType}, #{employmentLoyer}, #{employmentSalary}, #{employmentJobRole}, #{employmentIncentive}, #{employmentJobcat}, #{employmentMemo}, #{employmentOthers}, #{employmentQuit} )
mapper.update: UPDATE J_참여자관리 SET 취창업일 = #{employmentStartDate}, 취창업처리일 = #{employmentProcDate}, 취업유형 = #{employmentEmpType}, 취업처 = #{employmentLoyer}, 임금 = #{employmentSalary}, 직무 = #{employmentJobRole}, 취업인센티브_구분 = #{employmentIncentive}, 일경험분류 = #{employmentJobcat}, 메모 = #{employmentMemo}, 기타 = #{employmentOthers}, 퇴사일 = #{employmentQuit} WHERE 구직번호 = #{employmentJobNo}
mapper.select: SELECT 구직번호 AS employmentJobNo, CASE WHEN 취창업일 >= DATEADD(YEAR, -100, GETDATE()) THEN 취창업일 END AS employmentStartDate, CASE WHEN 취창업처리일 >= DATEADD(YEAR, -100, GETDATE()) THEN 취창업처리일 END AS employmentProcDate, 취업유형 AS employmentEmpType, 취업처 AS employmentLoyer, 임금 AS employmentSalary, 직무 AS employmentJobRole, 취업인센티브_구분 AS employmentIncentive, 일경험분류 AS employmentJobcat, 메모 AS employmentMemo, 기타 AS employmentOthers, 퇴사일 AS employmentQuit FROM J_참여자관리 WHERE 구직번호=#{employmentJobNo}
